regex.name: makelist
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client,control if not control.infoLabel('Container.PluginName') == 'plugin.video.thecrew': return url = client.schedule('https://fsportshdd.sbs/mlbstreams.php') return url

regex.name: makelist2
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client import xbmc,xbmcgui pDialog = xbmcgui.DialogProgress() pDialog.create('[B][COLOR orchid]THE CREW SPORTS[/COLOR][/B]', 'The Crew Is Loading Your Event Please Wait....') url = client.external('https://fsportshd.biz/[makelist.param1]') pDialog.update(65, 'The Crew Is Loading Your Event Please Wait....') pDialog.close() if (pDialog.iscanceled()): return return url

regex.name: makelist
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client,control import re if not control.infoLabel('Container.PluginName') == 'plugin.video.thecrew': return r = re.findall('(?s)<a href="([^"]*)">([^<]*).*?d>([^<]*)', page_data) return r

regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import site,workers,control import re page_data = page_data.split('MLB Live and Schedule',1)[-1] r = re.findall("(?s)([^<]*).*?p>([^<]*)", page_data) return r
